name: Enormous Adventures
description:
Dust off your NES or fire up your favorite emulation station and get ready.

You are Dr. Sonny Séance, a 36 year old theoretical physicist with a passion for music, books, and parkour. You arrive home from work one day to an apartment with two missing dogs and several "extra" government agents. 

  Someone took your dogs. The government is involved. Your quest for answers leads you down a path of corruption, insanity, and enormous adventure.

More than 30 stages take you from your apartment in the big city, to a government research facility, and ultimately across the galaxy in search of your princes (dogs). Traditional platforming action puts an emphasis on "run, dash, jump" rather than "kill the bad guys."

Featuring brand new sprite work and an original soundtrack by Ryan & The Blunts.

You will need an NES emulator of flashcart to play Enormous Adventures.
